itunes:title: Episode 860 - Super Hungover In Vegas
title: Episode 860 - Super Hungover In Vegas
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are live from Dream Racing where they have to drive $400,000 cars in 118 degree heat, while hungover. The loser had to do the entire episode in a flame retardant suit.  Guess who won?
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are live from Dream Racing where they have to drive $400,000 cars in 118 degree heat, while hungover. The loser had to do the entire episode in a flame retardant suit.  Guess who won?
